description: 5 automation workflow templates ready for Zapier/Make integrations

templates.name: Lead Capture to CRM Pipeline
templates.description: Automatically capture form submissions and create CRM records with follow-up tasks

trigger.description: When a new form submission is received

fields.message: New lead: {{typeform.first_name}} {{typeform.last_name}} from {{typeform.company}}. Check HubSpot for details.

templates.clientValue: Eliminates manual data entry, ensures no lead is missed, and alerts sales team instantly

templates.name: Invoice Payment Reminder Sequence
templates.description: Automated email reminders for unpaid invoices with escalation

trigger.description: When an invoice payment fails or is overdue

fields.subject: Friendly Reminder: Invoice #{{stripe.invoice_number}} is due
fields.body:
Hi {{stripe.customer_name}},

Just a quick reminder that invoice #{{stripe.invoice_number}} for {{stripe.amount}} is now due. Please process payment at your earliest convenience.

Best regards

fields.message: Invoice #{{stripe.invoice_number}} is 7+ days overdue. Customer: {{stripe.customer_name}}. Amount: {{stripe.amount}}. Consider direct outreach.

templates.clientValue: Reduces late payments by 60%, saves 2+ hours/week on manual follow-ups

templates.name: New Client Onboarding Workflow
templates.description: Automate welcome emails, task creation, and calendar scheduling for new clients

trigger.description: When a new client completes payment

fields.subject: Welcome to {{company_name}}! Here's what happens next

templates.clientValue: Reduces onboarding time from 2 hours to 5 minutes, creates consistent client experience

templates.name: Content Repurposing Pipeline
templates.description: Transform blog posts into social media content across platforms

trigger.description: When a new blog post is published

fields.prompt: Convert this blog post into a Twitter thread (5-7 tweets). Blog title: {{wordpress.title}}. Blog content: {{wordpress.content}}. Make it engaging, add emojis, end with a CTA to read the full post.

Convert this blog post into a LinkedIn post (300 words max). Blog title: {{wordpress.title}}. Blog content: {{wordpress.content}}. Professional tone, include key insights, end with engagement question.

templates.clientValue: Saves 3+ hours per blog post, ensures consistent social presence, maximizes content ROI

templates.name: AI Support Ticket Triage
templates.description: Automatically categorize, prioritize, and route support tickets using AI

trigger.description: When a new support conversation is created

fields.prompt: Analyze this support ticket and respond with JSON: {"category": "billing|technical|feature_request|general", "priority": "high|medium|low", "sentiment": "positive|neutral|negative", "suggestedResponse": "draft response"}. Ticket: {{intercom.message}}

templates.clientValue: Reduces first response time by 80%, ensures high-priority issues never slip through, improves customer satisfaction

usage.zapier: Import each template as a new Zap. Replace placeholder values with your actual app connections.
usage.make: Create scenarios matching the trigger and action sequence. Use the Make app integrations for each step.
usage.customization: All templates are starting points. Adjust fields, add filters, and extend with additional steps as needed.
